item.title: Digital transformation - 4 key building blocks
item.author: bhaskarvilles@duck.com (Bhaskar)
item.description: Here are four foundational elements on which to build your digital transformation strategy – plus a few barriers to avoid Digital transformation isn’t just about building great websites and mobile applications. It isn’t simply about providing a better user experience. While these are certainly critical enablers for success, truly reimagining how a business operates to thrive in a digital world requires much more – and skipping or failing to prioritize the “more” is where many organizations fall short of meeting their digital transformation goals.
